title: shaktik-kanal
sahitya:
shaktik-kanal vaLarppOm shuddha shaktik-kanal vaLarppOm


anupallavi

  bhaktik-kanalAl parishuddhamAghiyE mukti aLittiDum mUla kuNDaliyAna


caraNam    ducca ninaivugaLaip-pOkkumE tUya sutantarattaik-kAkkumE
naccum tinavugaLai nIkkumE nalla sheyalil veTri AkkumE
accap-perum pizhaiyait-tAkkumE �amaran yAn� enum uNarvUkkumE
koccai arakkargaLai vIzhttumE koNDADum anbargaLai vAzhttumE
kUTrai uraittavanaip-pOTrip-paramAnanda Utrai mighap-peukki Atral aruLum deiva
